turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I wanted to get some pizza from Tony's Pizzeria for the party tonight

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, how many total?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think three larges should do it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What toppings do you want on the first one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm, maybe half pepperoni and half plain cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sorry, Tony's pizzeria only allows whole pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, darn it. OK, well I guess we'll take one large pepperoni pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of cheese would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh just regular mozzarella, nothing fancy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of sauce do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just regular tomato sauce is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And for your second pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Right, yeah, we'll get a large Philly Cheese Steak Pizza

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That is not available at Tony's Pizzeria. I think it may be available at Domino's.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, I must have been mixed up. I'll stick with Tony's though. Are there any pizzas with steak at Tony's?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, there is a Meat Lover's Pizza with pepperoni, sausage, ham, and steak on it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh cool, I'll take a large one of that. With just regular tomato sauce and mozzarella cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And for your third pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think we'll just take a large cheese pizza. Just mozzarella and tomato sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right. Do you want any sides or drinks with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that's OK. How much will all that cost?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 50 dollars.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, please order that now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I just ordered it. The pizzas will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks so much!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. I texted you your receipt.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, bye!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Goodbye.
